text: The Employees Provident Fund Organisation would organise the monthly “PF Near You”, programme at its sub-regional office in the city on January 11. The programme is not only meant to redress grievances of subscribers and employers but also to invite their suggestions and sensitise stakeholders of the new initiatives taken by the EPFO. The meet would be open to subscribers from 10.30 a.m. to 1 p.m.; for employers from 3 to 4 p.m. and for exempted establishments from 4 to 5 p.m., G. Sivakumar, Regional Provident Fund Commissioner, Tiruchi, said in a press release.
title: “PF Near You”
